channel.title: Is Whonix Gateway enough for Windows Users against IP/IPV6/DNS leak?
channel.description:
hi everybody ,
**My Scenario**
**Windows as Host **, (windows updated installed , legimitate source , Antivirus , Firewall , antispyware installed ) everything ok.
**Virtualbox** Whonix-gateway installed.
**Virtualbox** Windows Xp as guest (NO windows updated installed , NO Antivirus , NO Firewall , NO antispyware installed , , Windows XP legimitate source but key no activated .
**FLASH** enabled , **WEBRCT** enabled , **JAVASCRIPT** enabled , **JAVA** enabled ,because i want to post , watching videos etc and i need plugins on.
My question , (except if somebody use an exploit against VM that's obvious), **can my** IP/I PV6 /DNS** leak to websites in that scenario?** eg,
You say before that even misconfigured OS , even malware / trojans , root privileges can not leak IP due to a Whonix design , right? 7 I know about NSA , i know about that active plug-ins i will remain pseudonimity , all about Windows Spy etc , i don't worry at all about them , i only want that to keep my IP / ipv6 /dns hidden against websites.
Its Whonix-gateway enough for Windows User to hidden ip against websites? , i mean , no IP-IPV6-DNS leak possibles?
THANKS

item.title: Is Whonix Gateway enough for Windows Users against IP/IPV6/DNS leak?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
unnamed:

You say before that even misconfigured OS , even malware / trojans , root privileges can not leak IP due to a Whonix design , right?
7

From inside Whonix-Workstation - IF the host is secure.

Windows hosts are discouraged generally:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Computer_Security_Education#Windows_Hosts

Read full topic
item.source: Is Whonix Gateway enough for Windows Users against IP/IPV6/DNS leak?

item.title: Is Whonix Gateway enough for Windows Users against IP/IPV6/DNS leak?
item.dc:creator: human
item.description:
hi everybody ,

My Scenario

**Windows as Host **, (windows updated installed , legimitate source , Antivirus , Firewall , antispyware installed ) everything ok.

Virtualbox Whonix-gateway installed.

Virtualbox Windows Xp as guest (NO
windows updated installed , NO Antivirus , NO
Firewall , NO antispyware installed , , Windows XP legimitate source but key no activated .

FLASH enabled , WEBRCT enabled , JAVASCRIPT enabled , JAVA enabled ,because i want to post , watching videos etc and i need plugins on.

My question , (except if somebody use an exploit against VM that’s obvious), can my IP/I PV6 /DNS** leak to websites in that scenario?** eg,

You say before that even misconfigured OS , even malware / trojans , root privileges can not leak IP due to a Whonix design , right?
7
I know about NSA , i know about that active plug-ins i will remain pseudonimity , all about Windows Spy etc , i don’t worry at all about them , i only want that to keep my IP / ipv6 /dns hidden against websites.

Its Whonix-gateway enough for Windows User to hidden ip against websites? , i mean , no IP-IPV6-DNS leak possibles?

THANKS

Read full topic
